a fantastic puzzleplatformer metroidvania what starts out as a simple puzzle game with each layer evolves into a more and more complex experience that manages to recapture those moments of playing games before the internet where you would share findings with friends on the playground to progress even if thats not what what youre looking for the base game is still an incredibly fun and fair puzzle game which no doubt will convince you to go searching deeper

animal well is a very fun puzzle platform game its like a sega genesis game in the modern era you unlock items to help along your quest that you dont have to use in any real order ost is heavenly and the puzzles are fun some are way more difficult to solve than others but you eventually figure it out time flew by until i beat the game thats how you know its a good game would recommend
